subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Casey Kotchman hit a two-run double to cap a three-run rally in the eighth inning helping the host Los Angeles Angels beat the Boston Red Sox, 5-3, on Sunday for their fifth straight win.
snippet: Casey Kotchman hit a two-run double to cap a three-run rally in the eighth inning helping the host Los Angeles Angels beat the Boston Red Sox, 5-3, on Sunday for their fifth straight win.
